Pre-Game Insights: The Clippers are 11-6 on their home court.
The Hawks have gone 8-10 away from home.
The Clippers are shooting 46.5% from the field this season, 0.9 percentage points lower than the 47.4% the Hawks allow to opponents.
The Hawks average 12.8 made 3-pointers per game this season, 0.1 more makes per game than the Clippers give up.
Miscellaneous Highlights: BETMGM SPORTSBOOK LINE: Clippers -6; over/under is 229
The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.
Others: James Harden is averaging 21.9 points, 6.1 rebounds, 7.8 assists and 1.5 steals for the Clippers.
Young is averaging 22.3 points and 12 assists for the Hawks.
The Clippers are eighth in the Western Conference with 15.6 fast break points per game led by Norman Powell averaging 4.6.
Atlanta is second in the Eastern Conference with 17.8 fast break points per game led by Jalen Johnson averaging 3.6.
